text: 4.13: Kra 3.45Mbe nza zɨri mbevav buni mbatɨgi guarira nza nzuaim, nza mbe buni ŋgarkav mbarara bunin mbe nzuai. Nza kha gumgi gu mbigi rɨmgi nɨman, mbe nza garim, nza guigira mbatɨgiap nzaŋnzaŋgi fara muuŋgi. Nza za kha gumgi rɨmgi nɨman, nza bigi mbatɨgi fara muuŋgiap guigira nzaŋnzaŋgi. Nza mbara muuŋgiap kav, zav, ntige khar ki.
